revised_title: Geological Analysis of Lignites and Clays in Bovey Tracey, Devonshire
tldr: This article discusses the geological analysis of lignites and clays in Bovey Tracey, Devonshire. The author explores the deposit's origin, composition, and age, concluding that it belongs to the Miocene period. The article also describes the various fossils found in the deposit, including dicotyledonous leaves, seeds, and stems of Sequoia Couttsice.
